topic: Psychological effects of prompt shuffling in creative exercises
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can reveal unconscious patterns and stimulate new creative pathways, both individually and collectively. The next step is to conduct a practical experiment by shuffling a set of my existing prompts and observing the new ideas or themes that emerge. I will document these outcomes and consider their implications for enhancing creativity and collaborative innovation.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
